Once you have passed all quiz stages, you will receive the online Galaxy AI Expert badge.

It is possible to retake and pass the quiz multiple times, but only one badge will be awarded.

Each stage of the quiz has a limit of five incorrect answers. If this limit is reached before completion of a stage, that stage must be restarted at the first question.
